name: Duat (mezzanine510)
description:
You are Anubis, Lord of the Duat. Guide the Souls in the afterlife to their destination by showing them your light.

Part of the GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022. This was my first ever game jam, and it was a really great experience.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls (Keyboard):
W - Move Up
A - Move Down
S - Move Left
D - Move Right

Controls (Controller)
Left-Stick - Move

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Assets:

Sandstone Texture:  https://substance3d.adobe.com/community-assets/assets/e36733c0af2bb3d1286fe331ca...
Character Body: https://www.mixamo.com/
Character Head: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/anubis-bust-636c098547e24805a796cca1773aa9bb
Base Character Walk Animation: https://www.mixamo.com/

All other music, sounds, textures, models, animations (including modifications like walking with the staff)  and VFX were created by me.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


UPDATES/BUG FIXES:
- fixed shadow issue, where player shadow would disappear when too many lights were present.
- fixed Pylar colliders so player can no longer walk through them.
- changed player controller slope limit to keep player in the bounds of the level.
- fixed bug where pressing the spacebar would exit player from the game.
- fixed main menu UI bug where buttons could be activated before they were visible.
